name: EditTicketConversation
description:
Edit a conversation in a Freshservice ticket.

Use this tool to edit the conversation on an existing Freshservice ticket. It is useful for updating information, correcting errors, or adding new details to a specific conversation within a ticket.

parameters.name: ticket_identifier
parameters.description: Integer representing the ID of the ticket whose conversation needs editing.

value_schema.description: ID of the ticket for which conversation has to be deleted

parameters.name: conversation_id
parameters.description: ID of the reply or note that needs to be updated in the Freshservice ticket.

value_schema.description: ID of the reply or note that needs to be updated

parameters.name: conversation_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details like IDs, body, timestamps, and email details for the conversation to be updated.

user_id.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

incoming.description: Set to true if a particular conversation should appear as being created from the outside (i.e., not through the web portal)

created_at.description: Date time at which the conversation is created

updated_at.description: Date time at which the conversation is updated

change_id.description: Unique ID of the change to which the note belongs

ticket_id.description: Unique ID of the ticket to which the note belongs

to_emails.description: Addresses to which the conversation must be sent

cc_emails.description: Addresses which must be copied on while sending the conversation

bcc_emails.description: Addresses to which a blind copy must be sent

value_schema.description: details of the conversation to be updated
